title: Automated Service Request Routing based on Geography
description: As a Consumer, I want my service request to be automatically routed to the correct Service Center based on my location and the product brand, so that I receive the fastest possible service without manual dispatch delays.
business_value: Reduces manual dispatch overhead by 100% for standard requests and ensures SLA compliance by instantly assigning the nearest eligible provider.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"User location falls within a specific Service Center's polygon","given":"A Service Center has a defined polygon service area in the system","when":"A user submits a request with coordinates inside that polygon","then":"The request is assigned to that Service Center"},{"scenario":"Multiple Service Centers cover the same location","given":"Two Service Centers have overlapping polygons for the same brand","when":"A user submits a request within the overlap","then":"The system assigns the request using a round-robin algorithm to balance load"},{"scenario":"No Service Center covers the location","given":"The user is in a remote location outside all defined polygons","when":"The user submits a request","then":"The system flags the request for manual review by a Super Admin"}]
technical_tasks: ["WI-BE-002: Implement Service Center Geo-Routing Algorithm","WI-INFRA-002: Provision Geo-Redundant PostgreSQL and PostGIS"]
definition_of_done: ["Geospatial query performance under 200ms","Unit tests covering edge cases (boundary lines, holes in polygons)","Routing logic handles 100 concurrent requests without failure"]

title: Interactive Service Area Definition
description: As a Super Admin, I want to draw and edit polygon geofences on an interactive map to define service areas, so that I can precisely control which territories are covered by specific Service Centers.
business_value: Eliminates errors associated with postal-code only mapping and allows for granular territory management in complex urban environments.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Drawing a new service area","given":"The Admin is on the Service Center configuration page","when":"They use the map tool to draw a closed polygon shape","then":"The shape is validated for self-intersections and saved as GeoJSON"},{"scenario":"Editing an existing area","given":"A service area already exists","when":"The Admin drags a vertex to a new position","then":"The updated geometry is reflected immediately and can be saved"}]
technical_tasks: ["WI-FE-001: Develop Interactive Map Component for Service Areas"]
definition_of_done: ["Mapbox component handles polygons with >50 vertices","GeoJSON output is valid according to RFC 7946","WCAG 2.1 AA keyboard navigation support for map controls"]

title: Real-time Technician Location Tracking
description: As a Consumer, I want to see my assigned technician's live location on a map when they are traveling to my location, so that I know exactly when to expect them and can be ready.
business_value: Increases customer satisfaction scores (CSAT) and reduces "Where is my tech?" support calls.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Technician is in Travel Mode","given":"The technician has activated Travel Mode for the specific ticket","when":"The technician moves","then":"The consumer's map view updates in real-time (latency < 2s)"},{"scenario":"Security check for location access","given":"A user tries to view location for a ticket they do not own","when":"They attempt to connect to the tracking stream","then":"The connection is rejected"}]
technical_tasks: ["WI-BE-004: Implement WebSocket Gateway for Technician Location","WI-MOB-002: Implement Background Location Tracking"]
definition_of_done: ["WebSocket gateway supports 10k concurrent connections","Location updates stop automatically upon job completion","Battery drain on technician device is within acceptable limits (<5%/hr)"]

title: Automated Invoice Data Extraction
description: As a Consumer, I want the system to automatically extract product details from my uploaded invoice photo, so that I can register my product quickly without typing error-prone serial numbers manually.
business_value: Reduces registration friction, leading to higher product registration rates and more accurate data for warranty validation.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Successful OCR extraction","given":"The user uploads a clear PDF or JPG invoice","when":"The processing finishes","then":"The purchase date, model number, and serial number fields are pre-filled"},{"scenario":"OCR Service Failure","given":"The external OCR service is down","when":"The user uploads an invoice","then":"The system degrades gracefully, prompting the user to enter details manually"}]
definition_of_done: ["Worker handles retries with exponential backoff","Sensitive invoice data is encrypted at rest","Processing time is under 10 seconds for standard images"]

title: Technician Offline Job Management
description: As a Technician, I want to update job statuses and capture completion details even when I have no internet connectivity, so that I can work in basements or remote areas without interruption.
business_value: Ensures data integrity and operational continuity in field environments with poor network coverage.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Completing a job offline","given":"The device has no network connection","when":"The technician marks a job as resolved","then":"The action is queued locally and the UI updates optimistically"},{"scenario":"Syncing upon reconnection","given":"Actions are queued locally","when":"Network connectivity is restored","then":"All queued actions are synced to the server in the correct order"}]
definition_of_done: ["Conflict resolution strategy is implemented","Data persists across app restarts","Sync process is transparent to the user"]

title: Role-Based Access Control for Platform Security
description: As a Security Officer, I want strictly enforced Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) across all system entry points, so that users can only access data and functions pertinent to their specific role (Consumer, Technician, Admin).
business_value: Ensures compliance with data privacy regulations and prevents unauthorized data access or privilege escalation.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Technician accessing Admin API","given":"A user authenticated as a Technician","when":"They attempt to call a Service Center Admin endpoint","then":"The system returns a 403 Forbidden error"},{"scenario":"Token Validation","given":"An API request arrives","when":"The JWT token is expired or invalid","then":"The system returns a 401 Unauthorized error"}]
technical_tasks: ["WI-BE-001: Implement Global RBAC Guard and JWT Strategy"]
definition_of_done: ["All API endpoints are protected by Guards","Unit tests cover all role permutations","JWT validation checks issuer and audience claims"]

title: Digital Proof of Service via Signature Capture
description: As a Technician, I want to capture the customer's signature digitally on my device upon job completion, so that there is non-repudiable proof that the service was delivered.
business_value: Reduces disputes regarding service completion and eliminates paper-based processing delays.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Capturing a signature","given":"The technician is closing a job ticket","when":"The customer signs on the screen","then":"A legible PNG image is generated and attached to the ticket"},{"scenario":"Device orientation change","given":"The signature pad is active","when":"The device rotates to landscape","then":"The signature capture area resizes correctly without losing input"}]
definition_of_done: ["Signature image is saved to Blob storage","Component works smoothly on low-end devices","Signature is linked to the specific Service Request audit log"]

title: Brand Performance Analytics Dashboard
description: As a Brand Admin, I want to visualize fault patterns and geographic distribution of service requests, so that I can make data-driven decisions about product quality and service coverage.
business_value: Provides high-value insights to brand partners, increasing platform stickiness and aiding in product quality control.
acceptance_criteria: [{"scenario":"Viewing Fault Patterns","given":"The dashboard has loaded","when":"I filter by a specific date range","then":"The bar charts update to show fault frequencies for that period"},{"scenario":"Exporting Reports","given":"I am viewing the analytics dashboard","when":"I click the print/export button","then":"A PDF formatted version of the current view is generated"}]
definition_of_done: ["Charts render correctly on all supported viewports","Data aggregation performance is optimized","Dashboard meets accessibility standards"]
